name: The Tomb of the King Arcadeus
name_original: The Tomb of the King Arcadeus
description:
Maybe King Arcadeus was just a child in the body of a grown man. To get his treasure you will have to beat his twisted games.   Are you ready for the challenge?

To get King Arcadeus treasure you will have to:

- Break the wall in the first room.

- Defeat the invaders in the second room.

- Survive the rain in stones of the thrid room.

- Open the  three gates in the burial chamber.

Know bug: Annoying noise in the transition between the start screen and the first level on the HTML version.
